titleStmt.title: William Powell alias Hinson Esq; plaintiffe; the Warden and Fellows of All-soules Colledge in Oxford defendants In the Chancellors Court of the University of Oxford in a pretended cause of dammage.
titleStmt.author: Powell, William.
All Souls College (University of Oxford)

notesStmt.note: "A matter of a renewed lease ... [which] was stated to be against the interest of Sir Edward Powell's executor, William Powell"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
